def_en: A lemming is an animal that looks like a large rat with thick fur. Lemmings live in cold northern regions and sometimes travel in very large numbers.

def_cn: （如旅鼠般）盲目从众者，随大流者
def_en: If you say that a large group of people are acting like lemmings, you are critical of them because they all follow each other into an action without thinking about it.
